text: Walter James Edyvean (October 18, 1938 - February 2, 2019) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was an auxiliary bishop of the Archdiocese of Boston from 2001 to 2014. He was born in Medford, Massachusetts. Edyvean died on February 2, 2019 in Boston, aged 80. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Medford, Massachusetts Category:People from Boston
title: Walter James Edyvean
